headline: Baxter Launches New Room Temperature Hemopatch Sealing Hemostat for Rapid and Convenient Application During Surgery
summary: VIENNA, April 10, 2025--Baxter International Inc. (NYSE:BAX), a global leader in advancing surgical innovation, today announced the introduction of Hemopatch Sealing Hemostat with room temperature storage at a symposium in Austria. The evolution of the product optimizes accessibility in the operating room, delivering an immediate solution for surgeons to control bleeding or prevent leakage. The product is now available to order throughout Europe.
